thag2.36:5.1: Whose mind is like a rock,
thag2.36:5.3: free of desire for desirable things,
thag2.36:5.4: not getting annoyed when things are annoying?
thag2.36:5.5: From where will suffering strike one
thag2.36:5.6: whose mind is developed like this?
thag2.36:6.1: My mind is like a rock,
thag2.36:6.3: free of desire for desirable things,
thag2.36:6.4: not getting annoyed when things are annoying.
thag2.36:6.5: From where will suffering strike me
thag2.36:6.6: whose mind is developed like this?
